## hpr3593 :: Home office setup mouse shoulder and Auto Hot Key Scripts

 
Anti Fatigue Floor Mat,Kitchen Mat
https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B076SPLWQF
FEZIBO Dual Motor Height Adjustable
https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B07QCNL73Y
WALMANN 24" Folding Shelf Brackets, Collapsible Brackets for Shelves Wall Mounted Hinges Space Saving DIY Bracket for Table Bench, Max Load 500 LBS
https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B08F4VNT9P
Adesso iMouse E9 Left-Handed Vertical Ergonomic Mouse
https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B01N4WA12I
Autohotkey macros for LEFT HANDED person!
https://github.com/freeload101/SCRIPTS/tree/master/AutoHotkey

auto installs Autohotkey
pulls down latest config/AHK script from github
runs it and based on IP address sets different configurations
